ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors acknowledge Debre Berhan University for funding, Ankober Village community, and laboratory technicians of college of health sciences, Addis Ababa University. The authors would like also to thank the Ethiopian Ministry of Science and Technology for partly funding field work and laboratory. This study was financed by Ankober Herbal Medicine Preparation and Plant Biodiversity Conservation Project from Debre Berhan University, Ethiopia.
